languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Астропат{/g} склонил голову в скорбной позе — весь его вид выражает страдание, плечи подрагивают.{/n} "Ваша Светлость... священный механизм... он..."

{n}His head bowed and his shoulders twitching, the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} cuts a sorrowful and anguished figure.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the sacred mechanism, it..."
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Астропат{/g} склонил голову в скорбной позе — весь его вид выражает страдание, плечи подрагивают.{/n} "Ваша Светлость... священный механизм... он..."

traits.locale_text: {n}His head bowed and his shoulders twitching, the astropath cuts a sorrowful and anguished figure.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the sacred mechanism, it—"

languages.text: {n}Con la cabeza gacha y los hombros temblorosos, el {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astrópata{/g} presenta una imagen abatida y angustiada.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... el mecanismo sagrado...».
languages.original_text: {n}His head bowed and his shoulders twitching, the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} cuts a sorrowful and anguished figure.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the sacred mechanism, it..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con la cabeza gacha y los hombros temblorosos, el Astrópata presenta una imagen abatida y angustiada.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... el mecanismo sagrado...».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}感応通信官{/g}は頭を下げて、肩をピクピクさせながら、悲痛な苦悶する表情を浮かべる。{/n}「陛下…神聖なる機械は…」
languages.original_text: {n}His head bowed and his shoulders twitching, the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} cuts a sorrowful and anguished figure.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the sacred mechanism, it..."

traits.locale_text: {n}感応通信官は頭を下げて、肩をピクピクさせながら、悲痛な苦悶する表情を浮かべる。{/n}「陛下…神聖なる機械は…」

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}星语者{/g}低着头，肩膀抽搐着，脸上满是悲伤和痛苦的表情。{/n}“大人……这台神圣的机器……它……”
languages.original_text: {n}His head bowed and his shoulders twitching, the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} cuts a sorrowful and anguished figure.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the sacred mechanism, it..."

traits.locale_text: {n}星语者低着头，肩膀抽搐着，脸上满是悲伤和痛苦的表情。{/n}“大人……这台神圣的机器……它……”

languages.text: {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} hat den Kopf gesenkt und seine Schultern zucken. Er gibt eine traurige, gepeinigte Gestalt ab.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... der heilige Mechanismus, er ..."
languages.original_text: {n}His head bowed and his shoulders twitching, the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} cuts a sorrowful and anguished figure.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the sacred mechanism, it..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Astropath hat den Kopf gesenkt und seine Schultern zucken. Er gibt eine traurige, gepeinigte Gestalt ab.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... der heilige Mechanismus, er ..."

languages.text: {n}La tête baissée et les épaules agitées de tremblements, l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}astropathe{/g} affiche une expression tourmentée.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... le mécanisme sacré... »
languages.original_text: {n}His head bowed and his shoulders twitching, the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} cuts a sorrowful and anguished figure.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the sacred mechanism, it..."

languages.text: {n}Başını eğen ve omuzları titreyen {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropat{/g}, kederli ve acı içinde görünüyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Kutsan mekanizma..."
